mapper.select: SELECT b.odate , b.profit FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.odate,'%Y-%m') as odate, SUM(i.itemprice) profit FROM admin a INNER JOIN facility f ON a.facilityid=f.facilityid INNER JOIN orders o ON f.facilityid=o.facilityid INNER JOIN item i ON i.itemid=o.itemid WHERE aid=#{aid} GROUP BY odate ORDER BY odate DESC LIMIT 10) b ORDER BY b.odate;

SELECT b.odate , b.cust_count FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.odate,'%Y-%m') as odate, COUNT(*) cust_count FROM admin a INNER JOIN facility f ON a.facilityid=f.facilityid INNER JOIN orders o ON f.facilityid=o.facilityid WHERE aid="admin02" GROUP BY odate ORDER BY odate DESC LIMIT 10) b ORDER BY b.odate;
